LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord_Vehicle.label: Kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord_Vehicle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_B.label: 2B9A Vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_B.description: An ancient design made for rapid fire indirect artillery suppression, it can fire 4 mortar rounds in one burst.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_B.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: 2B9A Vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGunMounted.label: Mounted HMG
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGunMounted.description:
A heavy machine gun for a mech soldier or as an infantry support platform.
This weapon is designed specifically for mounted usage, so only specific units can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGunMounted.label: Mounted LMG
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGunMounted.description:
A supressive weapon chambered with a full power rifle round.
This weapon is designed specially for mounted usage, so only specific units can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_ShotgunGunMounted.label: Close Inbound Defense System
LanguageData.DMS_ShotgunGunMounted.description: A multi-barrel turret designed to suppress enemies in close-range.
LanguageData.DMS_SubMachineGunMounted.label: Mounted SMG
LanguageData.DMS_SubMachineGunMounted.description:
A supressive weapon turret loaded with pistol caliber rounds.
This weapon is designed specially for mounted usage, so only specific units can equip it.
